page.title: 10A DAY IN THE LIFE OF-ADULT.
page.content: { A DAY IN THE LIFE OF LYNN'S GRANDPA. Mr.Maciver,who is retired,gets up at 9.00. After breakfast he puts on his outdoor clothes and goes to the shed for his dog Lassie. They make their way to the park to feed his 65 sheep. At noon he walks to the" Corner Shop" for the paper and gets home in time for the T.V.news and dinner.After dinner he returns to the park to check that all is well with the sheep and that all the gates are shut.At 4.00 he stacks the box with peats before settling down to afternoon tea and his paper.Tea-time is about 6.00.He then watches T.V. About 10.00 he has his supper,usually coffee and toast. He then puts Lassie to the shed and goes to bed around 11.30.
